attributes.action: make it compulsory that all exam boards provide relevant study aids (e.g. text books, interactive websites etc.) which are tailored to each qualification's specification
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many companies produce study aids, e.g. revision guides, interactive websites, worksheets etc. but they have to try to cover the many different exam board specifications. This means students have to go through study aids with a fine-toothed comb to check what they need to revise for the exam board specification they are sitting.

Wouldn't it be better if all exam boards   had to produce these study aids, so students could spend less time working out the material they need to cover and more time actually covering it?
